item.title: Bastion Ability Overview | Overwatch

meta.summary:
b'Forged in battle, at peace in nature: http://bit.ly/MeetBastion

Once a frontline combatant in the devastating Omnic Crisis, the curious battle automaton known as "Bastion" now explores the world, fascinated by nature but wary of a fearful humanity. Though Bastion appears to be gentleeven harmless, at timesits core combat programming takes over when the unit senses danger, utilizing its entire arsenal to eliminate anything it perceives as a threat.

Repair protocols, remote-controlled mines, and the ability to transform from an automatic rifle-wielding, mobile assault mode into a stationary siege cannon all provide Bastion with a high degree of effectiveness on the battlefield.

Sign Up for Beta: http://bit.ly/JoinOverwatch 
Like Us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/playoverwatch 
Follow Us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/playoverwatch'

What is overwatch?: Well overwatch is Blizzards new take on the fps genre. In this game you choose a hero or "Class" to take on enemies, push payloads, and take control points. The point of the game is to beat the other team over and it is indeed a whole bunch of fun to play. The game includes 24 heroes so far and Is a blast to play. In this video I mostly go over playing it in a commentary type of manner, and these types of videos will usually be overwatch live commentaries or overwatch group commentaries. As well expect a few guides of this game in the future and some box openings as well. Anyways, hope you enjoy blizzards new hit!'

item.title: Overwatch: BASTION Guide | Hero Abilities + Character Strategy | Bastion Tips & Tricks

meta.summary:
b'Overwatch Bastion Advanced Guide focusing on the Defence Character Bastion, with an in-depth Overview/guide on Bastion's weapons and abilities (Gameplay) plus strategy, tactics, tips on using them. (for PS4, Xbox One, PC) (Bastion Gameplay Montage shown in Background)

https://youtu.be/ulKlMzGdzds

Overwatch: BASTION Hero Guide | Character Abilities + Weapons (Gameplay Tips) (Advanced)

Overwatch - Bastion Abilities and Weapons Analysis:

Configuration: Recon

In Recon mode, Bastion is fully mobile, outfitted with a submachine gun that fires steady bursts of bullets at medium range.

Configuration: Sentry

In Sentry mode, Bastion is a stationary powerhouse equipped with a Gatling gun capable of unleashing a hail of bullets. The gun's aim can be "walked" across multiple targets, dealing devastating damage at short to medium range.

Reconfigure

Bastion transforms between its two primary combat modes to adapt to battlefield conditions.

Self-Repair

Bastion restores its health; it cannot move or fire weapons while the repair process is in effect.

Ultimate Ability: Configuration: Tank

In Tank mode, Bastion extends wheeled treads and a powerful long-range cannon. The cannons explosive shells demolish targets in a wide blast radius, but Bastion can only remain in this mode for a limited time. 

All Overwatch Heroes and Characters (in Base-game) Include: Bastion, D.Va, Genji, Hanzo, Junkrat, Lucio, McCree, Mei, Mercy, Pharah, Reaper, Reinhardt, Roadhog, Soldier: 76, Symmetra, Torbjorn, Tracer, Widowmaker, Winston, Zarya and Zenyatta

item.title: Bastion 101: How to use Tank mode effectively

meta.summary:
b'EDIT: So... something happened during rendering? I'm not really sure what, but the frame rate in this video is all over the place... I'm really sorry about that guys, hopefully that wont happen again, I hope you can just ignore it.


Hey guys, today I have an episode on Bastion 101 about how to be effective with the Tank ult.

Lots of people requested this so I hope I didn't disappoint, I don't usually make these kinds of videos so I'm sorry if the quality isn't perfect, I'll try to improve.

----------

Watch live on Twitch - https://www.twitch.tv/kolorbastion

Follow me on Twitter - https://twitter.com/Kolorblind_Josh

Thumbnail art by GHushPuppy - http://thegreathushpuppy.deviantart.com

Outro music is "Orb Weaver" by Getsix - https://getsixofficial.bandcamp.com/track/orb-weaver

Background music is "West Winds" by Getsix - https://soundcloud.com/getsixofficial/west-winds-prelude'
